item.title: Fourth Lesson October 2020
item.description: Fourth Lesson Welcome to the fourth lesson - 02/11/2020 9:00 - 12:00 Zoom meeting We will use Zoom. You can connect to zoom: following this link: (https://grenoble-inp.zoom.us/j/96592180886?pwd=dWVWU1lSTlViWStWR2NRd0JZMzBvUT09) (and, if needed, install the zoom app). or you can start the Zoom app with the following information meeting ID: 965 9218 0886 Password: ECO3 Class platforms We will use Caseine Caseine page is: (https://moodle.caseine.org/course/view.php?id=346) Class material Binary logistic

item.title: First Lesson October 1rst 2020
item.description: First Lesson Welcome to the first lesson - 05/10/2020 9:00 - 12:00 Introduction These Introduction slides present: Table of contents Introduction Program Motivations Importance of DCM Course Objectives General Context of Choice analysis Four broad frameworks Sample and Measurement Issues in Model Building R and Tests for Categorical Data Inference for a (Single) Proportion Two-Way Contingency Tables The Odds-Ratio Chi-Squared Tests of Independence Zoom meeting We will use Zoom.
